title: Propose an A/B Test Hypothesis
description: A CRO specialist wants to propose a new A/B test for the checkout page.

tasks.description: Analyze the checkout funnel and identify the step with the highest drop-off rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the 'shipping information' step has the highest exit rate.

tasks.description: Formulate a hypothesis in the 'If we..., then..., because...' format.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a clear hypothesis: 'If we change the CTA button color from blue to orange, then the conversion rate will increase, because orange has higher contrast and will draw more attention.'

tasks.description: Create a mock-up of the proposed change (the 'B' version).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent designs a visual representation of the test variant.
